original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1196)@</color>將全體敵方武將捲到自身面前，並以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1361)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1196)@</color> Roll all enemy generals in front of you, and use <color=#ccffcc>$ Skill_Str(1361)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage.
